recipesJson.name: Nanner milk
recipesJson.author: Morningstar
recipesJson.description: This is a reproduction of an excellent drink we found in South Korea. This has a real banana flavor, not like a Nestl√© milk drink.

reviews.text: Good job with this! I go to an ethnic market around where I live and have picked something up similar to this and this was great. Thick, dense banana and cream. Felt like I was drinking a thick, milky banana drink. Thanks!
